name: All-Master Necromancer
author: Blue Jaeng-yi
content: Betrayed and killed by his fellow Ninestar guild members, the powerful necromancer Cha Jin-Hyuk resorts to a daring soul transference.A decade later, he awakens in a new body, devoid of his former powers. With the support of his new comrades, Spirit Master Balkan and hobgoblin Haryu, he embarks on a quest for vengeance, scaling the mysterious tower once again.Only this time, he possesses the overpowered abilities of an All-Master, enabling him to master all the classes within the tower!
